item.dc:creator: @Boizun Boizun
item.description:
@Boizun wrote:

Your Server Is Now Up…
Good Luck :Wild
Is now online!
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “5
56 3233 3215 0 0 0
0 0 1 Rare Items”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1814)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23)
at server.main(server.java:28)

is the new error!

item.source: Shops, cant get them to work!. Its a christmas present for lil brother! Plz help

item.title: Shops, cant get them to work!. Its a christmas present for lil brother! Plz help
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“Boizun, post:1, topic:374978”]My little bro played a rsps for a while and got good at it, and he got scammed, hacked, duped, juped, pooped, you get the point! and i wanted to make him a rsps for christmas! i want have it done, by chrsitmas but a b’day presnet would be nice for him! So i have this problem! I have a shop and it works fine but he doesnt sell anything! i’ve tried to sell like buckets, swords, sheild, armour, phats and it doesnt work!
Grrrr stupid… shop error, (well its not working so i think its an error) Its driving me crazy!
:mad: :mad: :mad:
Any this is what i have… all i want is a shop that has phats… its that simple. Yet its as hard as pullin a rabit out your ass!
Alli want is the rare shop to work. 940 is an unique code and isnt bewing used! and 556 isnt a npc that is being used either!
} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
} else if (NPCID == 556) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 940;
} else if (NPCID == 554) { //Gilded Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 48; //Gilded Shop

This is in Shops.cfg ( the ‘shop =’ bit that usally goes in front of the shop code, make the run source going ape %$@!

940 Rare_shop 2 2 1048 100 1050 100 1038 100 1040 100 1042 100 1044 100 1046 100

and auto spawn! He spawns fine, you can trade him its just nothing appears! Ive used about 5 different codes! None work!

spawn = 556 3233 3215 0 0 0 0 0 1

Plz help me~!~!@!~!~!!~!1~!!~!!!~!1 (BTW im using Blanc or Blank client and Source + theres a god damn tool that comes with it called, Shopmakerv1.exe by jaywalker and it is simple and u hit in the data you want such as items + price, x and y, and npc etc. It generates the codes and you copy and paste into the correct location! And that doesnt work either. + i have watched 20+ videos, and tutorials on how to do it! BRRRRRRRRR help me and ill be very very very hjappy
You’ll make my chrissy! [/quote]
…

Do it like this

} else if (NPCID == 556) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 80;

940 is too high.

shop = 80 [ TAB ]  Rare_shop          2   2   1048   100   1050   100   1038   100   1040   100   1042   100   1044   100   1046   100

Keep [ TAB’s ] after every set of digits.

Read full topic
item.source: Shops, cant get them to work!. Its a christmas present for lil brother! Plz help

item.title: Shops, cant get them to work!. Its a christmas present for lil brother! Plz help
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

try this in your spawn config

spawn = 2244	Y_CORDS	X_CORDS	0	0	0	0	0	Guide/Donator shop

after the = is the npc id not a cord just so you know

also try putting this in your shop config shop = 1 Donator_shop 2 2 15000 100 13899 100 13902 100 13738 100 13740 100 13742 100 13744 100 13876 30 13870 30 13873 30 13887 30 13893 30 13884 30 13890 30 13861 50 13858 50 13864 50 13896 50 10330 200 10332 200 10334 200 10336 200 10338 200 10340 200 10342 200 10344 200 10346 200 10348 200 10350 200 10352 200 773 100 13879 1000 10926 1000000 627 10000

replace all those items with the items you wish to have in the shop the first number is what item you want and the second is how many of that item

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Boizun Boizun
item.description:
@Boizun wrote:

My little bro played a rsps for a while and got good at it, and he got scammed, hacked, duped, juped, pooped, you get the point! and i wanted to make him a rsps for christmas! i want have it done, by chrsitmas but a b’day presnet would be nice for him! So i have this problem! I have a shop and it works fine but he doesnt sell anything! i’ve tried to sell like buckets, swords, sheild, armour, phats and it doesnt work!
Grrrr stupid… shop error, (well its not working so i think its an error) Its driving me crazy!
:mad: :mad: :mad:
Any this is what i have… all i want is a shop that has phats… its that simple. Yet its as hard as pullin a rabit out your ass!
Alli want is the rare shop to work. 940 is an unique code and isnt bewing used! and 556 isnt a npc that is being used either!
} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
} else if (NPCID == 556) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 940;
} else if (NPCID == 554) { //Gilded Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 48; //Gilded Shop

This is in Shops.cfg ( the ‘shop =’ bit that usally goes in front of the shop code, make the run source going ape %$@!

940 Rare_shop 2 2 1048 100 1050 100 1038 100 1040 100 1042 100 1044 100 1046 100

and auto spawn! He spawns fine, you can trade him its just nothing appears! Ive used about 5 different codes! None work!

spawn = 556 3233 3215 0 0 0 0 0 1

Plz help me~!~!@!~!~!!~!1~!!~!!!~!1 (BTW im using Blanc or Blank client and Source + theres a god damn tool that comes with it called, Shopmakerv1.exe by jaywalker and it is simple and u hit in the data you want such as items + price, x and y, and npc etc. It generates the codes and you copy and paste into the correct location! And that doesnt work either. + i have watched 20+ videos, and tutorials on how to do it! BRRRRRRRRR help me and ill be very very very hjappy
You’ll make my chrissy!
